trans-unit.source: And now, go ahead and use it to output colors to your terminal:
trans-unit.target: あとは、これを使って端末に色を出力してみましょう。

trans-unit.source: For full details on using Painter, please check out the Painter GitHub Page.
trans-unit.target: For full details on using Painter, please check out the Painter GitHub Page.

trans-unit.source: Install Painter in your virtualenv as follows:
trans-unit.target: virtualenvに以下のようにPainterをインストールします。

trans-unit.source: Painter is an ANSI coloring library based on the excellent chalk and colors.js libraries for Node.js. However, painter attempts to provide an even more expressive API which reads like English.
trans-unit.target: Painter is an ANSI coloring library based on the excellent chalk and colors.js libraries for Node.js. However, painter attempts to provide an even more expressive API which reads like English.

trans-unit.source: Painter is fully tested with 100% coverage and also completely Flake8 compliant too!
trans-unit.target: Painterは100%のカバー率で完全にテストされており、Flake8にも完全に対応しています。

trans-unit.source: The output of this script looks something like this:
trans-unit.target: このスクリプトの出力は以下のようになります。

trans-unit.source: Your own expressive painter who colors text in your terminal.
trans-unit.target: あなたの端末で文字に色をつけるあなただけの表現力豊かな絵師。
